column1: Let me get this straight:  Huge potentially life-saving news for Americans is announced—COVID vaccine is 90% effective in trials.  And the Left reacts by saying it's "bad news" because it happened while Trump is in office?  Unbelievable.  They're beyond parody at this point. https://t.co/xkt1F3xM1O

🚨 The Justice Department sent letters to New York and New Jersey demanding their nursing home COVID data.  Thousands of seniors were killed by their policies—but Governors Cuomo and Murphy still refuse to give Congress the information requested.  Time for answers.

🚨🚨 Today Chuck Schumer and Senate Dems once again BLOCKED a clean COVID relief bill.  Don't let them blame @realDonaldTrump. Don't let them blame Mitch McConnell.  Every time Republicans try to deliver aid to Americans Dems block it to play politics.  RT so everyone knows!

🚨 Add Cuomo to the list of anti-vaxxer Dems.  He's now telling Americans to be skeptical of a CDC/FDA approved COVID vaccine.  This from the same man who broke federal guidelines and issued a nursing home order that killed thousands of seniors.  Maybe he should sit this one out. https://t.co/7P3NFRxyIr

Americans are fed up. https://t.co/UVQw5M5OOj
